champ_0128_rival_01: Ta-ta-tachán! Here’s our battle court for today![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0128_rival_02:
OK, right... Mm-hmm! Always important to check
what environment your Pokémon’ll be battling in![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0128_rival_03:
The battlefield can have these teeny effects on
your Pokémon’s balance and stuff, y’know?[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0128_rival_04:
Anyway, sorry I sorta dragged you here. But a
little pre-Gym warming up should do you good![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0128_rival_05:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Now c’mon, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]!
Let’s\r
have\r
us\r
a\r
fruitful\r
battle![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0128_rival_06a: That’s an L for me! Man, you’ve gotten so good![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0128_rival_06b: That’s a W for me! You battled real well, though![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0128_rival_07: I think that should be enough of a warm-up![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0128_rival_08:
You and your Pokémon should be all set now.
Here—take these as thanks for the battle![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0128_rival_09:
There’s just two Gyms remaining. Then all that’ll
be left is to try out to be a Champion! Give it all\r
you got![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0128_rival_10: Now let’s get you back to the Gym lobby![VAR 0114(0004)]
